Humansdorp is a small town in the Eastern Cape with a population of around 35 000.  
This town is the centre of the Cacadu municipal district's industry and farming. It is also 
considered the gateway to the coastal town of Jeffreys Bay, which is 16 kilometres 
away. Humansdorp is a 50-minute drive away from Port Elizabeth. It is eco-friendly and 
maintains its small-town charm with various hiking trails and forest walks.
